Brush for hair and the hacker and i think everything will go dayz the new one is sorted now I have
It took some time, till somebody contaced me. But as soon as Mike wrote me, everything went good ;)
The way that Mike kept me appraised of what was going on with my problem.
good help within one day from Dashlane Customer Support.regarding browser problem
Issue was solved. Customer rep. was helpfull in helping to solve the issue.
Finally, a company that understands that it is not necessary to offer robots as interlocutors to its customers at all costs!

Review.Titre: I was very statisfied with your company…
Review.Contenu: I was very statisfied with your company and can only report the best

Review.Titre: Agent referred me to an article from…
Review.Contenu: Agent referred me to an article from which I was able to solve my problem.

Review.Titre: The third agent was finally able to…
Review.Contenu: The third agent was finally able to explain what I was doing wrong.
I solved the problem finally myself but the repsonse was fast.
My only annoyance was the delay in 2fa arrival.

Review.Titre: It is keeping great work tracking my…
Review.Contenu: It is keeping great work tracking my passwords.

Review.Titre: The personal assistance of the people…
Review.Contenu: The personal assistance of the people in charge is excellent. The automated is rather poor, as it needs a lot of time and refers always to common help-advices, which do not answer the question for help.

Review.Titre: Help articles did not address my issue, my live rep did
Review.Contenu: None of the articles and "help" pages addressed my specific issue.  I chose not to try chat as my problem was a bit complicated.  While support is not immediate (you need to send your problem and wait for support to respond; a few days), the help that finally came from a service rep was extremely helpful.  He understood my issue, offered a solutuion not available elsewhere that worked.  I was able to reset master password on one device without losin my account.
Lots of features even with the free version
Good Support, tricky VPN setup, finally it works
Quick, honest feedback from Bernado and Taciane

Review.Titre: … Very good support with small shortcomings
Review.Contenu: So on the whole I am very satisfied with this support! The only drawback is that you chat and don't talk to the support until the problem is solved!The best support I have ever experienced is from Apple! I am 65 years old and have made various support requests and I am not employed by Apple!If you want I can tell you more about it!They are on a very good path!!!!!Very many thanks again for the support received!!!!👍👍🙏

Simply, I had a technical issue about the synchronization process of the vault of my premium account when installing back the mobile app in a device where it had been uninstalled. Support has been found ready and concerned. Even though I do not know how, neither if it was their merit, effectively, the problem was resolved completely in less than a week, and the service went back working.

Hi,Dashlane is my one the best apps Ive ever used.Ive tested bunch of password managerbut finaly I choosed Dashlane.recently I had some major issues unfortunatlyand as I contacted DCSI got few useful tipsand finally after about 20 days of waiting(beacuse I couldnt access my phone)my issue has been completly solvedand Im happy with it.your team did a great job.I gave Dashlane 2 stars in playstorebeacuse of my issue persistedthat much long,but Now Im gonna give you 4 or 5 stars!Thank you so much

Review.Titre: Best password manager in the market
Review.Contenu: Best password manager in the marketThe other extra features are very useful too. The only downside is it's a bit costly in India. A one-screen Netflix subscription in India costs 2.5 USD/mo which is less than Dashlane's. Dashlane could introduce a separate billing model for India as Netflix.

Review.Titre: One of the best password managers
Review.Contenu: I have been using Dashlane for years now. The service is decent and is constantly updated adding new features. When they discontinued their desktop version, that caused a backlash and support tickets flooded their system. I truly thought that was the end for Dashlane, but they survived. Not only did they fix many of the issues that affected the service, but also they continued to add new features that were present jn the desktop app, but missing from their Web extension.Regarding support, there is a bit of delay in their response time, but overall support is helpful.

Review.Titre: The chat function on the support site worked well
Review.Contenu: Will of the support staff was very conscientious and totally followed up on my problem and its resolution - through to its completion.  Very satisfied with my interaction with him.  The only reason for the 4 star (rather than 5) is that it took quite a lot of email exchanges prior to my chat with Will to get the matter resolved.  After I clicked on the chat feature of the support team, everything pulled together for me.

Review.Titre: Ever since I started using Dashlane
Review.Contenu: Ever since I started using Dashlane, I never had problems with any account being compromised. Generated passwords are strong and hard to guess. Tools offered like vpn helps with security and privacy, having that VPN on their made it cost effective for me. I can save sensitive files and creds securey. It also makes it easy to access my online accounts with passkey. I’d recommend Dashlane to my family n friends.

Excellent product and excellent customer service. The only thing that would be better would be if they offered monthly payments for their Teams Plan so you only need to pay for what you use. But still giving them 5 stars.

Dashlanes manual renewal process is confusing when you’ve been on a Family plan, by default it gets you to renew with premium. Rita was very quick to refund the premium renewal and move my renewal back to the family plan
Great product that works flawlessly. Customer support is also good and was able to help out with my query.

I recently managed to delete a bunch of passwordsI immediately let Dashline know they asked a few questions and finally rolled my Dashlane back to a time before the accident and all I well. I cannot thank you enough. Super job Dashlane!!

Asking for help with my problem using email was a dead end. I received an automatic response right away telling me they were busy and would get back to me as soon as possible.  But almost 2 weeks later, still no help. But today I presented my problem to Rita on Chat and she resolved my problem in short order. She was kind, prompt, and obviously had the expertise I needed.
Helped changing contact email. easy to understand and clear process. Thank you Peter

Fantastic productI've been using Dashlane for many years, and I've never had an issue.A recent support enquiry was resolved in under an hour. The agent was very prompt and professional in attending to my issue.Thank you!

It's a transactional relationship until it isn't. Had an issue with our subscription and it was fixed by a real person. Too easy! Was pleasantly surprise because most apps nowadays don't have real people in customer service. More importantly, we've been using Dashlane for 5+ years and there's still nothing better.

Dashlane currently (in the days prior to Thanksgiving, 2023) has a customer support team that both thoroughly verifies a customer's identity, and is patient and supportive throughout the process of regaining access to the customer's account. In my case, Manuel in particular was both clear and took as many times as needed to finally get me a three-hour, 2FA code at a time that worked best for me. Thank you for making my life easier, Dashlane! Happy Thanksgiving to your whole team.

Review.Titre: Rita was able to go in and verify what…
Review.Contenu: Rita was able to go in and verify what I was asking.  That was a relief to me and gave me much comfort.
I have used dashlane for a year, no dataeaks,and easy to use i think everyone should use it

Review.Titre: We had to go back and forth a bit
Review.Contenu: We had to go back and forth a bit, but once the rep figured out what the issue was, she was very helpful in helping me fix it.

Review.Titre: Dashlane provides an easy and secure…
Review.Contenu: Dashlane provides an easy and secure way to share passwords with colleagues who are all working remotely.

Review.Titre: Customer Service is above and beyond
Review.Contenu: Customer Service is above and beyond!  I had an issue with a certain group of passwords not showing up on Edge. Within the hour, Rita got back to me via email. It took several attempts to fix the error, but she hung in there with me.  I have been a Premium subscriber for 8 years, and get what I pay for - service that counts. Very satisfied

Review.Titre: Thanks for your very good assistance
Review.Contenu: My Representative, Rita, was very professional and helpful in answering my questions and helping me to make an informed decision on upgrading.Thanks Rita!!!!

Review.Titre: Rita sent very easy to understand &…
Review.Contenu: Rita sent very easy to understand & complete instructions on how to correct the problem!

Excellent password manager that's easy to use and integrates perfectly between all of my devices and operating systems (android phones & tablets / Windows PC).Following the discovery of a minor issue after a recent update, Customer Services were very quick to respond, acknowledge my query, and follow up with updates on what was occurring regarding a fix. The cause of the issue was quickly discovered and a timeframe for the fix provided via email. Just what you want from a team.Highly recommend Dashlane 👍👌

Review.Titre: had a problem with missing data
Review.Contenu: had a problem with missing data. Submitted help request and got answer in day. Problem was resolved and data restored. Got follow-up emails from an actual person.

Review.Titre: One of the best password managers ever.
Review.Contenu: Fantastic app. Would be lost without it. There's so small issues where not all the passwords will automatically be added to certain password fields and the prompt will show up in text fields where I don't want them to, but other than that, I have zero issues with this password system. Absolutely would recommend to everyone.

Review.Titre: Single user with multiple accounts (ie free and business)
Review.Contenu: The issue affect me was that I had multiple accounts including my employers business account. This caused problems which I incorrectly blamed Dashlane for.
